  • Method Details

    • of

      public static CookieBuilder of(@NonNull @NonNull String name, @NonNull @NonNull String value)
      Creates a new CookieBuilder instance with the specified name and value. You can then chain methods to set additional properties for the cookie. Note: Calling the same method multiple times will overwrite the previous value. Example: 
       CookieBuilder cookieBuilder = CookieBuilder.of("sessionId", "abc123")
    .withPath("/path")
    .withPath("/newPath")
    .build();
      The resulting cookie string will be: `"sessionId=abc123; Path=/newPath"`
      Parameters:
      name - The name/key of the cookie.
      value - The value of the cookie.
      Returns:
      A new CookieBuilder instance.

    • withPath

      public CookieBuilder withPath(@NonNull @NonNull String path)
      Sets the path for which the cookie is valid.
      Parameters:
      path - The path for which the cookie is valid. The cookie will be sent to the server only if the request URL path starts with this value.

    • withDomain

      public CookieBuilder withDomain(@NonNull @NonNull String domain)
      Sets the domain for which the cookie is valid.
      Parameters:
      domain - The domain for which the cookie is valid. The cookie will be sent to the server only if the request URL domain matches this value.

    • withMaxAge

      public CookieBuilder withMaxAge(@NonNull @NonNull Integer maxAge)
      Sets the maximum age of the cookie in seconds.
      Parameters:
      maxAge - The maximum age of the cookie in seconds. After this time, the cookie will be deleted.

    • withMaxAge

      public CookieBuilder withMaxAge(@NonNull @NonNull Duration maxAge)
      Sets the maximum age of the cookie.
      Parameters:
      maxAge - The maximum age of the cookie. After this time, the cookie will be deleted.

    • withSecure

      public CookieBuilder withSecure()
      Sets whether the cookie should be marked as secure (HTTPS only).

    • withHttpOnly

      public CookieBuilder withHttpOnly()
      Sets whether the cookie should be marked as HttpOnly (not accessible via JavaScript).

    • withSameSite

      public CookieBuilder withSameSite(@NonNull @NonNull CookieBuilder.SameSite sameSite)
      Parameters:
      sameSite - The SameSite attribute of the cookie. This attribute can be used to control whether the cookie is sent with cross-site requests.
      See Also:
      • MDN Web Docs - SameSite

    • build

      public String build()
      Builds the cookie string that can be used in the Set-Cookie header.
      Returns:
      The cookie string that can be used in the Set-Cookie header.
